panels.brickConf: {"brick":"presentational-bricks.brick-table","properties":{"showCard":false,"rowKey":"time","columns":[{"title":"时间","dataIndex":"time","key":"time"},{"title":"接口","dataIndex":"ifIndex","key":"ifIndex"},{"title":"接口类型","dataIndex":"iftype","key":"iftype"},{"title":"接口速率","dataIndex":"ifspeed","key":"ifspeed"},{"title":"管理状态","dataIndex":"ifadminstatus","key":"ifadminstatus","useBrick":{"brick":"presentational-bricks.brick-value-mapping","transform":{"value":"@{cellData}"},"properties":{"mapping":{"1":{"text":"开启","color":"green"},"2":{"text":"关闭","color":"red"}}}}},{"title":"运行状态","dataIndex":"ifoperstatus","key":"ifoperstatus","useBrick":{"brick":"presentational-bricks.brick-value-mapping","transform":{"value":"@{cellData}"},"properties":{"mapping":{"1":{"text":"开启","color":"green"},"2":{"text":"关闭","color":"red"}}}}},{"title":"接口 MTU","dataIndex":"ifmtu","key":"ifmtu"}],"configProps":{"pagination":false}},"lifeCycle":{"useResolves":[{"provider":"providers-of-data-exchange.olap-api-query","args":[{"model":"<% \"easyops.\" + PARAMS.get(\"objectId\") %>","dims":["time(1m)","ifIndex"],"measures":[{"name":"iftype","function":{"expression":"last","args":["iftype"]}},{"name":"ifspeed","function":{"expression":"last","args":["ifspeed"]}},{"name":"ifadminstatus","function":{"expression":"last","args":["ifadminstatus"]}},{"name":"ifoperstatus","function":{"expression":"last","args":["ifoperstatus"]}},{"name":"ifmtu","function":{"expression":"last","args":["ifmtu"]}}],"filters":[{"name":"instanceId","operator":"==","value":"${QUERY.instanceId|string}"},{"name":"time","operator":">=","value":"${QUERY.from=\"now-1h\"|string}"},{"name":"ifIndex","operator":"!=","value":"null"},{"name":"time","operator":"<=","value":"<% parseInt(+moment() / 1000) %>"}],"order":[{"name":"time","order":"desc"}],"limit":{"limit":10,"offset":0}}],"transform":{"dataSource":"<% { ...DATA, list: DATA.list.map(row => ({ ...row, time: moment(row.time * 1000).format(\"YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss\"), ifspeed: PIPES.unitFormat(row.ifspeed, \"bibytes\", 0), ifmtu: PIPES.unitFormat(row.ifmtu, \"bytes\", 0) })) } %>"},"onReject":{"transform":{"error":"<% DATA.message || '接口请求错误' %>"}}}]}}
panels.title: 接口状态

panels.brickConf: {"brick":"chart-v2.time-series-chart","properties":{"height":230,"xField":"time","yFields":["ifinoctets","ifoutoctets"],"axis":{"yAxis":{"min":0,"unit":"bps"}}},"lifeCycle":{"useResolves":[{"provider":"providers-of-data-exchange.olap-api-query","args":[{"model":"<% \"easyops.\" + PARAMS.get(\"objectId\") %>","dims":["time(1m)"],"measures":[{"name":"ifinoctets","function":{"expression":"avg","args":["ifinoctets"]}},{"name":"ifoutoctets","function":{"expression":"avg","args":["ifoutoctets"]}}],"filters":[{"name":"instanceId","operator":"==","value":"${QUERY.instanceId|string}"},{"name":"time","operator":">=","value":"${QUERY.from=\"now-1h\"|string}"},{"name":"time","operator":"<=","value":"<% parseInt(+moment() / 1000) %>"}],"order":[{"name":"time","order":"desc"}]}],"transform":{"data":"@{list}"},"onReject":{"transform":{"error":"<% DATA.message || '接口请求错误' %>"}}}]}}
panels.title: 接口流量

panels.brickConf: {"brick":"chart-v2.time-series-chart","properties":{"height":230,"xField":"time","yFields":["ifinucastpkts","ifoutucastpkts","ifinnucastpkts"],"axis":{"yAxis":{"min":0,"unit":"bps"}}},"lifeCycle":{"useResolves":[{"provider":"providers-of-data-exchange.olap-api-query","args":[{"model":"<% \"easyops.\" + PARAMS.get(\"objectId\") %>","dims":["time(1m)"],"measures":[{"name":"ifinucastpkts","function":{"expression":"avg","args":["ifinucastpkts"]}},{"name":"ifoutucastpkts","function":{"expression":"avg","args":["ifoutucastpkts"]}},{"name":"ifinnucastpkts","function":{"expression":"avg","args":["ifinnucastpkts"]}}],"filters":[{"name":"instanceId","operator":"==","value":"${QUERY.instanceId|string}"},{"name":"time","operator":">=","value":"${QUERY.from=\"now-1h\"|string}"},{"name":"time","operator":"<=","value":"<% parseInt(+moment() / 1000) %>"}],"order":[{"name":"time","order":"desc"}]}],"transform":{"data":"@{list}"},"onReject":{"transform":{"error":"<% DATA.message || '接口请求错误' %>"}}}]}}
panels.title: 接口包速率
